SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_D4CAMPAIGNPROCESS_GETPARAMETERS
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Defines a stored procedure that is used within the business process .NET CLR code to retrieve the instance parameters for a given id. See D4CampaignBusinessProcess.vb
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_D4CAMPAIGNPROCESS_GETPARAMETERS ( @ID uniqueidentifier ) as begin -- do work begin try if @ID is null raiserror ('The Campaign Type parameter value is empty! Unable to continue.', 16, 1)
select CAMPAIGNTYPE from dbo.USR_D4_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS where ID = @ID end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1; end catch end
